abstract: Sam Borden On Soccer column describes tense atmosphere surrounding World Cup qualifying match between Mexico and United States in Columbus, Ohio, which Mexico won, 2-0, following Donald J Trump's victory in 2016 US presidential election; notes Trump has called for deporting undocumented immigrants and building wall between two countries.

headline.print_headline: For U.S.-Mexico Match, Diplomacy Plays Out in the Stands
headline.main: Before U.S. and Mexico Play, Fans Push for Respect in a Charged Atmosphere

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Unusual feelings surround this World Cup qualifier, the most significant sporting event involving an American national team since the charged presidential election....
lead_paragraph: Unusual feelings surround this World Cup qualifier, the most significant sporting event involving an American national team since the charged presidential election.
